info.comment:
This is the little attacher's last robot body before he dies! Collect the human germs and stay alive for 2 minutes to win the third installmant. This one is the hardest so far! Are you up for the challenge.
************************************To help the little attacher live for a little longer click love it. If I get 50 love it's I will make Germ Attacher 4.
************************************
Also, I'm setting a challenge! Download this game and make a 3-D version. Upload it and put a link to it in your comments! The deadline is 29th June 2010.
************************************Please comment and rate! Thank-you!
info.author: 05jhill
